title: Connectivist Learning Design Based on Web 2.0: Strengthening Language Practitioner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and comprehension of basic language learning concepts
context.additional_context: Focuses on building collaborative learning networks using Web 2.0 tools and strengthening practical application competencies for current language professionals. Requires learner-driven activity design using social software (blogs, wikis, social media) in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can build personal knowledge networks shared with peers using Web 2.0 tools.
Learners can design online community-based collaborative learning scenarios to solve language practical problems.
Learners can select reliable language learning resources by applying digital content evaluation criteria.

resources: Language learning OER (Open Educational Resources) links

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
